item.title: This One Item That You Can't Afford to Forget - You'll Be Surprised What It Is!
item.description: Introduction It’s easy to forget the small things when it comes to our daily lives, but there is one item that you can’t afford to forget You may be surprised to learn that this item is not a physical object, but rather a habit or mindset This item is the practice of taking time to pause and reflect Definition of the Item Taking time to pause and reflect is an activity that involves taking a few moments to think about the day, the week, or even the year It can involve reflecting on what has gone well, what could have gone better, and what can be done differently in the future It is a practice that can be done alone or with others
